body_html: As mentioned by RuiShu in the issue 367 thread, you can compute logdetA = 2*sum(log(diag(chol(A)))) (for a symmetric pos def matrix, such as a correlation matrix), which currently should now be doable with tf ops which also have gradients. Haven't tried that out myself though (I would need logdet for general non-symmetric matrices anyway).
